description: Professional API Performance Monitoring Dashboard - Request metrics, latency analysis, and system resources

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(handler, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[5m])))

sum by(handler) (rate(http_requests_total{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health", status=~"2.."}[1m])) / sum by(handler) (rate(http_requests_total{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[1m]))

sum by(handler) (rate(http_requests_total{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health", status=~"5.."}[1m])) / sum by(handler) (rate(http_requests_total{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[1m]))

sum by(handler, status) (rate(http_requests_total{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[1m])) / sum by(handler) (rate(http_requests_total{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[1m]))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(method, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[1m]))) * 1000
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by(handler, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[5m]))) * 1000
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(handler, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[5m]))) * 1000
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(handler, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[5m]))) * 1000

sum by(handler) (rate(http_requests_total{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health", status=~"5.."}[5m])) / sum by(handler) (rate(http_requests_total{job="fastapi-backend", handler!="/metrics", handler!="/health"}[5m]))

title: API Performance Monitoring - Professional Dashboard
